li.label: Istari
li.description: NAME is a manifestation of a Maiar spirit sent to the world to help fight corrupting forces. They possess maximum magic potential and learn new spells quickly.

li.label: hedgemage
li.description: NAME is a hedgemage and takes much longer to learn magic spells than other magicly attuned individuals.

li.label: mage
li.description: NAME is a rare individual that possesses blessed ability to attune magic. They are somewhat slow to learn spells, however, since they are difficult for non-Istari to master.

li.label: sorcerer
li.description: NAME is one of perhaps a handful of folk that is a powerful mage capable of learning spells quickly and wielding them with deadly precision.
